fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Any pension-related activity of any EU institution (European Commission, EIOPA...). E.g.: 
 
1. RESAVER initiative.  
2. TTYPE initiave: European pension tracking service.  
3. IORP II Directive implementation.  
4. Pan-European Personal Pension product (PEPP).  
5. Etc
organisation_name: European Association of Public Sector Pension Institutions (EAPSPI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
1. Seminars: arranged by EAPSPI on its own or together with some other pension organisation.  
 
2. Annual General Meeting: apart from EAPSPI General Assembly annual meeting, there is an Open Information Meeting and an Open Conference on pension-related issues.
goals__remit:
Mission: EAPSPI is… 
 
-    a communication platform to share and exchange expertise and innovations.  
-    a collaboration network in order to provide a voice of public sector pension institutions in Europe. 
 
 
Vision: first-class quality and services in pensions for the public sectors in Europe.
